sn24.36:1.2: “Kismim nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kim upadaya, kim abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.36:1.3: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti?
sn24.36:2.1: “Rupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rupam upadaya, rupam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.36:2.2: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
sn24.36:2.6: vinnane sati, vinnanam upadaya, vinnanam abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.36:2.7: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti.
sn24.36:3.4: api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.36:3.5: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti?
sn24.36:3.7: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkham upadaya, dukkham abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.36:3.8: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
sn24.36:3.14: api nu tam anupadaya evam ditthi uppajjeyya:
sn24.36:3.15: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti?
sn24.36:3.17: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkham upadaya dukkham abhinivissa evam ditthi uppajjati:
sn24.36:3.18: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
